title: What veterinarians know that physicians don't
description: What do you call a veterinarian who can only take care of one species? A physician. In a fascinating talk, Barbara Natterson-Horowitz shares how a species-spanning approach to health can improve medical care of the human animal -- particularly when it comes to mental health.
author: Barbara Natterson-Horowitz
keywords: TED, talks, animals, biology, evolution, medicine, mental health
